derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a noun denoting a person with a diseased spleen): from late Latin spleneticus, from Greek splēn (see spleen)

entry.def: If you describe someone as splenetic, you mean that they easily become very angry about things.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to the spleen

sentences.sentence: "bristly exchanges between the White House and the press"
